metadata.description: A shocking tale of betrayal, lust and warring kingdoms from the acclaimed creator Alejandro Jodorowsky! Wounded, betrayed and left for dead, King Alvar returns to his kingdom to regain his stolen throne, finding himself in the middle of a bloody political game for power. To keep his throne, Alvar must crush his enemies who would destroy him with their machinations. But his own horrific appetites may prove his undoing...
metadata.name: Royal Blood
